shortdesc.ph: Gets the maximum zoom factor supported by the camera.
Gets the maximum zoom factor supported by the camera.

section.note: This method applies to Android and iOS only. You must call this method after the SDK triggers the callback and returns the local video state as LOCAL_VIDEO_STREAM_STATE_CAPTURING (1).
You must call this method after the SDK triggers the callback and returns the local video state as LOCAL_VIDEO_STREAM_STATE_CAPTURING (1).

section.title: Return Values
section.p: Returns the maximum zoom factor supported by the camera if the method call succeeds.
If the method call succeeds, returns the maximum zoom factor supported by the camera.
